name: Striking Resemblance

review.name: SEE KIM YATES DO A STRIP DANCE
review.reviewBody:
An excellent plot driven soft core film with Nichole Gain as a detective. Perhaps it is a bit slow but the fine acting makes up for this if you are especially tired of seeing the same old simulated sex antics.

For me, the best part was seeing the soft core star Kim Yates do an exotic dancer routine.
